library.name: Cold-Start Confirmation
library.message_on_fail: BL-BOOT-001 VIOLATION: Cold-start confirmation missing. Every session must begin with COLD_START_CONFIRMATION section proving that boot contract, behavior rules, and lessons are loaded. This is not optional. No work is valid without this proof.

library.name: Runtime Sync Before Test
library.message_on_fail: BL-ENV-001 VIOLATION: Runtime sync missing. Rebuild target service and wait for healthy before testing.

library.name: Auth Contract Enumeration
library.message_on_fail: BL-AUTH-001 VIOLATION: Auth contract not enumerated. List endpoint auth dependencies, RBAC policy, and required headers.

library.name: Timestamp Semantics
forbid: using aware datetime with WITHOUT TIME ZONE
using naive datetime with WITH TIME ZONE
library.message_on_fail: BL-TIME-001 VIOLATION: Timestamp semantics mismatch. Declare column type and datetime kind. Match aware/naive to column.

library.name: Service Name Verification
forbid: assuming service name equals container name
using container name in compose commands
using service name in docker exec
library.message_on_fail: BL-DEPLOY-001 VIOLATION: Service name not verified. Enumerate services before build/run.

library.name: Migration Head Verification
library.message_on_fail: BL-MIG-001 VIOLATION: Migration heads not verified. Check current state and verify single head before proceeding.

library.name: Single Migration Head Enforcement
remediation: Verify: alembic heads (must show single head)
library.message_on_fail: BL-MIG-002 VIOLATION: Multiple migration heads detected! Cannot proceed with migration work until fork is resolved. Exception: merge migrations allowed with MERGE_JUSTIFICATION section.

library.name: Test Execution Prerequisites
library.message_on_fail: BL-TEST-001 VIOLATION: Test prerequisites not verified. Complete prerequisites before running tests.

library.name: Acceptance Mode Immutability
forbid: fixing bugs to make test pass
library.message_on_fail: BL-ACC-001 VIOLATION: Acceptance tests cannot modify code. If precondition fails, STOP and report blocker. Do not fix-to-proceed. File the blocker and exit.

library.name: Runtime Readiness Checklist
forbid: assuming container uses same DB as local
library.message_on_fail: BL-RDY-001 VIOLATION: Runtime readiness not verified. Check container DATABASE_URL, verify tenants exist, verify worker_registry populated. Do not proceed until all fields are YES.

library.name: Execution Topology Awareness
library.message_on_fail: BL-EXEC-001 VIOLATION: Execution topology not declared. Before crashing anything, identify: executor (backend/worker/external), async model (inline/background_task/queue), and crash target. Verify by reading code or docker inspect.

section_templates.RUNTIME_SYNC:
RUNTIME SYNC CHECK
- Services enumerated: YES / NO
- Target service: <name>
- Rebuild command: <command executed>
- Health status: healthy / unhealthy
- Auth headers verified: <list>
section_templates.AUTH_CONTRACT:
AUTH CONTRACT CHECK
- Endpoint: <path>
- Endpoint auth: <Depends(...)>
- RBAC policy: <resource:action>
- Required headers: <list>
- Test command: <curl with all headers>
section_templates.TIME_SEMANTICS:
TIMESTAMP SEMANTICS CHECK
- Table: <name>
- Column type: WITH TIME ZONE / WITHOUT TIME ZONE
- Python helper: datetime.utcnow() / datetime.now(timezone.utc)
- Alignment verified: YES / NO
section_templates.SERVICE_ENUM:
DOCKER NAME CHECK
- Compose services: <list>
- Running containers: <list>
- Target service: <name>
- Target container: <name>
- Command uses: SERVICE / CONTAINER (correct?)
section_templates.MIGRATION_HEAD:
MIGRATION HEAD CHECK
- Current: <revision>
- Heads: <list>
- Single head: YES / NO
- Parent for new migration: <revision>
section_templates.SINGLE_HEAD_CHECK:
SINGLE HEAD ENFORCEMENT CHECK
- Script: scripts/ops/check_migration_heads.sh
- Exit code: 0 (success) / 1 (multiple heads)
- Heads output: <revision(s)>
- Head count: <number>
- Single head verified: YES / NO (BLOCKER if NO)
section_templates.MERGE_JUSTIFICATION:
MERGE JUSTIFICATION (exception to BL-MIG-002)
- Reason: resolving existing fork
- Heads to merge: <list of head revisions>
- Merge command: alembic merge <heads> -m "<description>"
- Post-merge verification: alembic heads (must show single)
section_templates.TEST_PREREQ:
TEST PREREQUISITES CHECK
- Database accessible: YES / NO
- Backend healthy: YES / NO
- Migrations current: YES / NO
- Required fixtures: <present / missing>
section_templates.ACCEPTANCE_PRECHECK:
ACCEPTANCE PRECHECK (BL-ACC-001)
- Scenario: <name>
- Code freeze: YES (no modifications allowed during test)
- Migrations allowed: NO (any schema change = STOP)
- Config changes allowed: NO (any env/config edit = STOP)
- All preconditions verified: YES / NO
- If ANY field is not as required: STOP and report blocker
section_templates.RUNTIME_READINESS:
RUNTIME READINESS (BL-RDY-001)
- Authoritative DB: <host/db verified from container env>
- Container DB match: YES / NO (container points to same DB)
- Tenants present: YES / NO
- Worker registry populated: YES / NO
- Required NOT NULL fields known: YES / NO
section_templates.EXECUTION_TOPOLOGY:
EXECUTION TOPOLOGY (BL-EXEC-001)
- Executor: backend / worker / external
- Async model: inline / background_task / queue
- Crash target: <component to crash>
- Verified by: <code path or docker inspect>
section_templates.COLD_START_CONFIRMATION:
COLD_START_CONFIRMATION (BL-BOOT-001)
- Boot contract loaded: YES / NO
- Behavior rules loaded: <count> rules (list IDs)
- Lessons enforced loaded: YES / NO
- Current phase: A / A.5 / B / C
- Frozen decisions: <list of frozen PINs if any>
